DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Exceptions to Selected Period
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Time keyed-in in current period but belonging to another period","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#ffffff","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":32,"WidgetYPosition":0,"WidgetRows":12,"WidgetColumns":16,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Un-approved Time","metricFieldValue":"UnapprovedTime"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"SELECT 
		u.[Name] AS [User] ,
        ut.[Name] as UserType,
		CAST(t.[Date] AS DATE) AS [Date] ,
		SUM(t.[ActualTime]) AS Timesheet 
FROM 
		[User] u ,
		Analytics.DatamartTimesheet t ,
		Timesheet ot ,
        UserType ut
WHERE 
		u.PaidOvertime = '1' AND 
        t.UserId = u.Oid 
        AND u.UserType = ut.Oid
		AND t.Oid = ot.Oid 
		AND ot.CreatedOn >= @FromDate AND ot.CreatedOn < @ToDate 
		AND NOT t.[Date] >= @FromDate AND t.[Date] < @ToDate 
GROUP BY 
		u.Name ,
        ut.[Name],
		CAST(t.[Date] AS DATE)","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Overtime Overview
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Bars represent weeks with Overtime","WidgetType":"rangeselector","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#ffffff","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":0,"WidgetRows":12,"WidgetColumns":32,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"startDate":"2018/06/1","endDate":"2019/06/30","type":"year","visible":false},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"SELECT 
		v.[week], 
		v.WeekStart, 
		sum(v.Overtime) as Overtime 
FROM ( 
		SELECT 
				MAX(DATEPART(ww, t.[DATE])) AS [Week] ,
				MAX(t.[DATE]) AS WeekStart ,
				SUM(IIF((t.ActualTime) > 8, 1, 0)) AS Overtime 
		FROM 
				[User] u ,
				Analytics.DatamartTimesheet t 
		WHERE 
				u.PaidOvertime = '1' 
				AND t.UserId = u.Oid 
		GROUP BY 
				DATEPART(yyyy, t.[DATE]) ,
				DATEPART(ww, t.[DATE]) 
		UNION ALL 
		SELECT 
				MAX(DATEPART(ww, yd.[Day])) AS week, 
				MAX(yd.[Day]) AS WeekStart, 
				0 as Overtime 
		FROM 
				YearDay yd 
		WHERE 
				yd.[Day] between DateAdd(mm, -6, GETDATE()) AND DateAdd(mm, 1, GETDATE()) 
		GROUP BY 
				DATEPART(yyyy, yd.[Day]), 
				DATEPART(ww, yd.[Day]) ) v 
		GROUP BY 
				v.[week], 
				v.WeekStart 
		ORDER BY 
				v.WeekStart
","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":null}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Overtime for Selected Period
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Showing Overtime Paid at x1.5 and at x2","WidgetType":"pivotgrid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":12,"WidgetRows":20,"WidgetColumns":48,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Forecast","metricFieldValue":"TimeGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Actual","metricFieldValue":"UtilizationPercentGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"SELECT	
        v.Department,
        v.City,
        v.[User],
        v.UserExternalNumber,
        v.UserType,
        v.[day],
        v.[week],
        v.Holiday,
        v.Leave,
        v.TimesheetUnApproved,
        v.LeaveApproved,
        v.WeekHours,
        v.TimesheetMoFr,
        v.MissingHoursMoFr,
        v.TimesheetMoSa,
        v.[weekday],
        v.Timesheet,
        v.[Overtime x1],
        v.[Overtime x15],
        v.[Overtime x2],
		v.Timesheet + v.Holiday + v.Leave as TotalHours
FROM
(
SELECT Department,
       City,
       [User],
       UserExternalNumber,
       UserType,
       [day],
       [week],
       SUM(Holiday) AS Holiday,
       SUM(Leave) AS Leave,
       SUM(TimesheetUnApproved) AS TimesheetUnApproved,
       SUM(LeaveApproved) AS LeaveApproved,
       SUM(TimesheetWeek) AS WeekHours,
       SUM(TimesheetMoFr) AS TimesheetMoFr,
       SUM(MissingHoursMoFr) AS MissingHoursMoFr,
       SUM(TimesheetMoSa) AS TimesheetMoSa,
       DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DAY) AS [weekday],
       SUM(Timesheet) AS Timesheet,
       CASE
           WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DAY) IN (1,2,3,4,5) THEN 0
           WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DAY) IN (6) AND SUM(TimesheetMoFr) <= 48 THEN IIF(SUM(Timesheet) > 8, 8, SUM(Timesheet))
           WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DAY) IN (7) AND SUM(TimesheetMoSa) < 40 THEN IIF(SUM(Timesheet) > 8, 8, SUM(Timesheet))
           ELSE 0
       END AS [Overtime x1],
       CASE
           WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DAY) IN (1,2,3,4,5) THEN 
				IIF(SUM(Timesheet) > 8, IIF((SUM(Timesheet) - 8) > 4, 4, (SUM(Timesheet) - 8)), 0)
           WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DAY) IN (6) AND SUM(TimesheetMoFr) < 40 THEN 
				IIF(SUM(Timesheet) <= 8, 0, IIF(SUM(Timesheet) - 8 > 4, 4, SUM(Timesheet) - 8))
           WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DAY) IN (6) AND SUM(TimesheetMoSa) > 48 THEN 
				IIF(SUM(Timesheet) < 12, SUM(Timesheet), 12)
           WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DAY) IN (7) AND SUM(TimesheetMoSa) <= 40 THEN 
				IIF(SUM(Timesheet) <= 8, SUM(Timesheet), IIF(SUM(Timesheet) - 8 > 4, 4, SUM(Timesheet) - 8))
           WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DAY) IN (7) AND SUM(TimesheetWeek) > 40 THEN 
				IIF(SUM(Timesheet) < 8, SUM(Timesheet), 8)
           ELSE 0
       END AS [Overtime x15],
       CASE
           WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DAY) IN (1,2,3,4,5) THEN IIF(SUM(Timesheet) > 12, (SUM(Timesheet) - 12), 0)
           WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DAY) IN (6) AND SUM(TimesheetMoFr) < 40 THEN 
				IIF(SUM(Timesheet) > 12, SUM(Timesheet) - 12, 0)
           WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DAY) IN (6) AND SUM(TimesheetMoSa) > 40 THEN 
				IIF(SUM(Timesheet) > 12, SUM(Timesheet) - 12, 0)
           WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DAY) IN (7) AND SUM(TimesheetMoSa) < 40 THEN 
				IIF(SUM(Timesheet) > 12, SUM(Timesheet) - 12, 0)
           WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DAY) IN (7) AND SUM(TimesheetMoSa) >= 40 THEN 
				IIF(SUM(Timesheet) > 8, SUM(Timesheet) - 8, 0)
           ELSE 0
       END AS [Overtime x2]
FROM (
		SELECT 
				t.Department AS Department,
				c.Name AS City,
				u.Name AS [User],
				u.ExternalNumber AS UserExternalNumber,
				ut.[Name] as UserType,
				t.[Date] AS [day],
				t.[Date] - DATEPART(dw, t.[Date]) + 1 AS [week],
				SUM(t.ActualTime) AS Timesheet,
				SUM(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, t.[Date]) IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5), t.ActualTime, 0.0))) 
					OVER (PARTITION BY u.[Name], t.[Date] - DATEPART(dw, t.[Date]) + 1) AS TimesheetMoFr,
				SUM(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, t.[Date]) IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5), IIF((u.RequiredHours - t.ActualTime) > 0.0, (u.RequiredHours - t.ActualTime), 0.0), 0.0))) 
					OVER (PARTITION BY u.[Name],
				t.[Date] - DATEPART(dw, t.[Date]) + 1) AS MissingHoursMoFr,
				SUM(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, t.[Date]) IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6), t.ActualTime, 0.0))) 
					OVER (PARTITION BY u.[Name], t.[Date] - DATEPART(dw, t.[Date]) + 1) AS TimesheetMoSa,
				SUM(IIF(ot.StateMachineTimesheetStatus = 1, 0, t.ActualTime)) AS TimesheetUnApproved,
				0 AS Holiday,
				0 AS Leave,
				SUM(SUM(t.ActualTime)) OVER (PARTITION BY u.ExternalNumber, t.[Date] - DATEPART(dw, t.[Date]) + 1) AS TimesheetWeek,
				0 AS LeaveApproved
		FROM 
				Analytics.DatamartTimesheet t,
				Timesheet ot,
				[User] u
				LEFT OUTER JOIN City c ON (u.City = c.Oid)
				LEFT OUTER JOIN UserType ut ON (ut.Oid = u.UserType)
		WHERE 
				t.Oid = ot.Oid AND
				u.PaidOvertime = 1 AND
				t.UserId = u.Oid 
				/*[DateFilter]*/ AND t.[Date] >= @FromDate AND t.[Date] < @ToDate /*[/DateFilter]*/
		GROUP BY 
				t.Department,
				c.Name,
				u.Name,
				u.ExternalNumber,
				ut.[Name],
				t.[Date],
				t.[Date] - DATEPART(dw, t.[Date]) + 1
		UNION ALL 
		SELECT 
				hld.Department,
                c.Name AS City,
                u.Name AS [User],
                u.ExternalNumber AS UserExternalNumber,
				ut.[Name] as UserType,
				hld.[Date] AS DAY,
				hld.[Date] - DATEPART(dw, hld.[Date]) + 1 AS WEEK,
				0 AS Timesheet,
				0 AS TimesheetMoFr,
				0 AS MissingHoursMoFr,
				0 AS TimesheetMoSa,
				0 AS TimesheetUnApproved,
				hld.[Hours] AS Holiday,
				0 AS Leave,
				0 AS TimesheetWeek,
				0 AS LeaveApproved
		FROM 
				Analytics.DatamartHoliday hld
				LEFT OUTER JOIN [User] u ON hld.UserId = u.Oid
				LEFT OUTER JOIN City c ON (u.City = c.Oid)
				LEFT OUTER JOIN UserType ut ON (ut.Oid = u.UserType)
		WHERE 
				u.PaidOvertime = 1 
				/*[DateFilter]*/ AND hld.[Date] >= @FromDate AND hld.[Date] < @ToDate /*[/DateFilter]*/
		UNION ALL 
		SELECT 
				lvs.Department AS Department,
                c.Name AS City,
                u.Name AS [User],
                u.ExternalNumber AS UserExternalNumber,
				ut.[Name] as UserType,
				lvs.[Date] AS DAY,
				lvs.[Date] - DATEPART(dw, lvs.[Date]) + 1 AS WEEK,
				0 AS Timesheet,
				0 AS TimesheetMoFr,
				0 AS MissingHoursMoFr,
				0 AS TimesheetMoSa,
				0 AS TimesheetUnApproved,
				0 AS Holiday,
				lvs.[Hours] AS Leave,
				0 AS TimesheetWeek,
				IIF(lvs.Approved = 1, lvs.[Hours], 0) AS LeaveApproved
		FROM 
				Analytics.DatamartLeave lvs,
				[User] u
				LEFT OUTER JOIN City c ON (u.City = c.Oid)
				LEFT OUTER JOIN UserType ut ON (ut.Oid = u.UserType)
		WHERE 
				u.PaidOvertime = 1 AND
				lvs.[UserId] = u.Oid AND
				lvs.Rejected = 0 AND
				/*[DateFilter]*/ lvs.[Date] >= @FromDate AND lvs.[Date] < @ToDate /*[/DateFilter]*/ ) t
		GROUP BY 
				Department,
				City,
				[User],
				UserExternalNumber,
				UserType,
				DAY,
				WEEK
	) v
--WHERE (v.Timesheet > 0 OR v.Leave > 0)","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate"]}}]
